Review Title: Good, but results not as advertised
Review Text: After using this for a month I can say this somewhat helps Making the teeths white. But not as bright as I expected and shown on packaging. Also the taste is very weird, but you'll get used to once you start using it.I would prefer a regular toothpaste from next time.
Packaging was not good for this product . Kindly make the product value for money and donot send a defected product to us .thnks

Review Title: It does it work but decays your enamle
Review Text: I've used it and got little results. Could be used for a month but don't use it regularly (my dentist also recommended the same) as it would decay your enamle. If your teeths are very yellow then go for some Desi jugads (home made remidies) or consult your dentist. It won't fully brighten your teeth but would give some result. Overall, could be used for a month or less but do not even think of using it regularly :)
Your teeth will never become white if you use this paste
Not very good just value of money

Review Title: This toothpaste doesnt work for everyone
Review Text: It is peeling my skin on my lips If I use it twice a day. The product mentioned to use 3 times a day but when I used it my lips became completely chapped and It took me till a week to recover my lips.

Review Title: Mouth get burnt in a week

Review Text: Makes no difference other than the hole in your pocket.Rather use babool or anchor toothpaste, it will save you lot of money.

Review Title: Amazon provides the worst brand to the customer.Don't trust Amazon Choice

Review Text: This is just false advertisement. It wont do anything special but clean your teeth like a regular toothpaste. Whitening? hell no. In fact my teeth started to turn yellow. Could be due to the excess of fluoride it contains. whatever. I wont buy it again. It belongs to the fairness cream category, just fancy branding.
It does not whiten my teeth. üò≠
